author: Todd Haselton
title: You can now control Spotify with Siri on your iPhone — here's how to set it up
description: You can now ask Siri to play music from Spotify. Here's how to set it up and ask Siri to play your Spotify library.
content:
Spotify on Monday updated its app with a new option that lets you play music from Spotify using Siri.
